sentences.english: Kim So-yeon is an actress who exudes both innocence and confidence.
sentences.chinese: 金素妍是一個即天真又自信的女演員。

sentences.english: But claiming that you have no competition is naive.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果說你的產品沒有競爭者，那就太天真了。

sentences.english: I'll get old, but not lose first naive.
sentences.chinese: 我會越來越老成，卻不會丟掉最初的天真。

sentences.english: Because he got rid of his ignorant and uncouth sweetness, he is no longer a boy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲褪去了年少無知和天真爛漫，他就不再是孩子了。

sentences.english: Are clients forgiving to the point of naivety?
sentences.chinese: 客戶們是因爲天真而選擇寬恕的嗎？

sentences.english: I Childishness naive forever traveling in the blue space.
sentences.chinese: 我童稚的天真永遠遨遊於湛藍的太空。

sentences.english: Innocence, Monsieur, is its own crown.
sentences.chinese: 先生，天真本身就是王冕。

sentences.english: Tom is a cute but mischievous child.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是一個天真活潑而又調皮孩子。

sentences.english: It is no doubt a pleasure to explore the wonders of nature with children who are so innocent and lovely.
sentences.chinese: 與天真爛漫的兒童一起接觸大自然確是賞心樂事。

sentences.english: She was innocent and dared to love and hate.
Fuck the priests who put their hands down some innocent child's pants.
sentences.chinese: 操那些神父，把手伸進那些天真孩子的褲襠。

sentences.english: 'I'm not the naive, weak little girl I was when I was attacked.
sentences.chinese: 我不再是受到襲擊時那個天真，柔弱的女孩了。

sentences.english: There is a beautiful naiveté to that school lesson.
sentences.chinese: 這種學校教育中有着一種美麗的天真。

sentences.english: I love him all the better for his innocence.
sentences.chinese: 正因爲他的天真爛漫，我才更加愛他。

sentences.english: But a little innocent joy-riding goes badly wrong.
sentences.chinese: 但有點天真快樂的騎嚴重出錯。
